sentence: Consumer products maker The Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) saw its coverage initiated on Thursday with a "Buy" rating by analysts at Stifel Nicolaus.
The firm also set a $72 price target on PG shares, which had closed at $61.74 on Wednesday.
Stifel noted that the company should continue to see accelerating sales growth in its product lines.
We have been recommending shares of PG since Sept.1, when the stock was trading at $54.11.
The company has a 3.13% dividend yield, based on last night's closing stock price of $61.74.
The Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) is a "recommended" dividend stock, holding a Dividend.com DARSâ„¢ Rating of 3.5 out of 5 stars.
